sn45.12:1.3: Namhi kenaci upasankamitabbo, annatra ekena pindapataniharakena”ti.
sn45.12:1.4: “Evam, bhante”ti kho te bhikkhu bhagavato patissutva nassudha koci bhagavantam upasankamati, annatra ekena pindapataniharakena.
sn45.12:2.1: Atha kho bhagava tassa temasassa accayena patisallana vutthito bhikkhu amantesi:
sn45.12:2.2: “yena svaham, bhikkhave, viharena pathamabhisambuddho viharami, tassa padesena vihasim.
sn45.12:2.17: chando ca avupasanto hoti, vitakko ca avupasanto hoti, sanna ca avupasanta hoti, tappaccayapi vedayitam;
sn45.12:2.18: chando ca vupasanto hoti, vitakko ca vupasanto hoti, sanna ca vupasanta hoti, tappaccayapi vedayitam;
sn45.12:2.19: appattassa pattiya atthi ayamam, tasmimpi thane anuppatte tappaccayapi vedayitan’”ti.
